item.description:
You're welcome to join us for our third Portuguese Table of 2009. This will be a fun easy going get together. No pressure to speak completely in Portuguese. You can get comfortable by just listening then jump in when you're ready to talk.

With a firm commitment of at least ten (10), the quiet table in the corner will be reserved, which allows for better conversation.

Sometime ago in separate conversations Ramzi and Alvaro suggested we have simple lessons during our Portuguese Table. I thought we could play a game which can also serve as an ice breaker. Each person has five cards and the object of the game is to be the person with the most cards after five statements have been made, in Portuguese of course. The statement is "I have never...." and then you complete the sentence. For example, "I have never learned how to fly a plane." or "Nunca aprendi como voar um avi√£o." Then those who know how to fly a plane would put a card in the middle of the table. Then the next person will say "I have never...." and so on and so on.

You're not required to take part, you're welcome to have individual conversations.

Feel free to eat while we chat. Here are the menus for food and beer.

There will NOT be a group bill. Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go since people will be arriving and leaving at various times.

MBTA:
Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route. Less than five (5) minute walk from Harvard subway station on the Red Line.

DRIVING DIRECTIONS:
Check out Google to plan your driving route

PARKING:
Very limited parking at meters on Dunster and JFK Streets as well as Massachusetts Avenue. Check out Harvard Square Public Parking for garages and lots.
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Tonya/Portuguese Table Meetup

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Portuguese Table - Wednesday February 25th 7:00 PM
